info.name: fflib
info.description: FFLib is a lightweight c++ framework.FFlib is mainly designed for game server developing. But some components in FFLib is in common use. For example socket&net module, log module, thread&lock, tools for performance & memory leak check.用于分布式程序的c++类库，封装了socket、rpc、lua、CQRS框架、算法等组件，适于SNS、WEBGAME、MMO后台程序， about C++,linux socket,lua,rpc,broker,cqrs,timer,log libary
